title: GitaChat
tagline: Spiritual guidance from the Bhagavad Gita
description: A semantic search application that finds the most relevant verse from 700+ Bhagavad Gita verses based on natural language queries. Uses 768-dimensional embeddings for accurate matching and GPT-powered commentary summarization to provide personalized spiritual insights.
highlights: Semantic search across 700 verses using BAAI/bge-base-en-v1.5 embeddings
Query history persistence with user authentication

title: Espress
description: A full-stack coffee logging app that helps users track drinks, discover flavor preferences, and get personalized recommendations. Features an interactive ranking system, comprehensive analytics, and Claude-powered natural language input parsing.
highlights: Natural language parsing for drink logging
Binary comparison ranking system for taste profiling
Spending analytics and flavor trend visualization
